divs: Sighting DetailsMe and the wife stepped out to have a smoke when I noticed a weird diamond shape or long centered thick oval slowly drifting smooth. I said hey look at thats weird. She said where? And soon after it started slowly vanishing as if it was entering an invisible tunnel. And we didn't see it again. There were no cloud cover and no trees this high up. This isn't our first UFO sighting so we aren't shocked anymore, lol.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Ontario
There were no other sightings in Ontario on or around January 31st 2012
